1. Primary Immunoglobulin M Nephropathy (IgMN)
2. Membranoproliferative Glomerulonephritis (MPGN)
3. Idiopathic Membranous Nephropathy (IMN)
4. Infectious Mononucleosis (IM) with renal involvement
5. Post-Streptococcal Glomerulonephritis (PSGN)
6. Henoch-Schönlein Purpura (HSP) Nephritis
7. Alport Syndrome
8. Membrano-Collagenous Nephropathy (MCN)
9. Focal Segmental Glomerulosclerosis (FSGS)
10. Chronic Inflammatory Vasculitis (CIV) with renal involvement
